about_the_game:
Indulge in the enticing realm of Hentai Senpai: Seieki Akuma-Tachi! Immerse yourself in a labyrinth of devilish delights as you tackle tantalizing puzzles, all adorned with seductive demons waiting to captivate your every move.

🧩 Puzzle Features:

  • Engage your intellect with two classic puzzle styles: demonic swapping and infernal rotating. Devise cunning strategies to unveil the secrets of the alluring Akuma-Tachi!

🔥 Meet the Demon Beauties:

  • Unlock the forbidden desires of 182 captivating Seieki Akuma-Tachi, each radiating with infernal allure!

🖼️ Sinful Gallery:

  • Explore the seductive charm of the Akuma-Tachi effortlessly. Plunge into the temptation of each character through a user-friendly gallery interface.

❤️ Favorites System:

  • Select your most cherished Akuma-Tachi for swift access and succumb to their infernal allure!

📷 Immersive Visuals:

  • Immerse yourself in the vibrant underworld of the Seieki Akuma-Tachi with spellbinding 5K detail. Let the provocative and devilish Akuma-Tachi seduce your senses!

🎵 Enchanting Soundtrack:

  • Immerse yourself in haunting melodies. Let the music of the underworld set the mood for your steamy escapades!

⚙️ Technical Customization:

  • Personalize your gaming experience to your infernal desires. Adjust settings like resolution, fullscreen mode, framerate, and more. Adapt to the temptations and delights that lie ahead!



Embark on a carnal odyssey through the enchanting universe of Hentai Senpai: Seieki Akuma-Tachi, where your cunning and acumen in solving puzzles unveil the allure and charm of the Akuma-Tachi.

All characters depicted are demons (18+).

content_descriptors.notes:
Hentai Senpai: Seieki Akuma-Tachi contains graphic sexual content including nudity, sexual acts, genitalia, masturbation, bodily fluids & BDSM themes. All sexual acts contain consenting adult characters. The setting is dark and bleak. Some characters may have small amounts of blood on them and burn marks. (They are demons after all!)
All characters are adults (18+).

name: Hentai Senpai: Seieki Akuma-Tachi

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1050
  • Storage: 410 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Required for epic demonic tunes
  • VR Support: N/A
  • Additional Notes: Will more than likely work on requirements less than this.

short_description: Dive into Hentai Senpai: Seieki Akuma-Tachi, a devilishly seductive puzzle game featuring 182 Akuma-Tachi! Uncover the desires of these captivating Seieki Akuma-Tachi in vibrant, immersive visuals. Succumb to infernal allure as you solve puzzles and explore the underworld!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Swedish, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese
